name: Mr. Dobbly
description:
Mr. dobbly lost his 6 magic dices, can you help him find him back? Platform in 6 different locations with 6 different powers, decided by Mr. dobbly's feelings.

moving is done with A , D and the space bar

Created for the GMTK game jam 2022

Creaters:

Programmers: Isoar, Febstone
Artist: Alpaca, Mope
Music: The Magic Sound man
